level.heading: Violations of Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act ("RESPA").
level.text: The Commissioner or Attorney General may bring an action in a court of competent jurisdiction to enjoin or seek remedies for violations of the Real Estate Settlement Procedures Act of 1974, approved December 23, 1974 (88 Stat. 1724; 12 U.S.C. ยง 2601 et seq.).

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 2163 of Fiscal Year 2011 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2010 (D.C. Act 18-463, July 2, 2010, 57 DCR 6542).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-223
level.text: For Law 18-223, see notes following ยง 31-5031.01.
